command.active: Add thesaurus tags to active file

csv.columns: The columns doesn't correspond with the settings.
csv.header: You can have only two column in your thesaurus. You have: {{- len}} columns.
csv.malformed: Your CSV is malformed: there is no column.
csv.separator: The specified separator is invalid. You seems to use "{{- sep}}" as separator.

error.noPath: The path to the thesaurus is empty!
error.noPaths: No file paths have been included in the parameters.
error.notFound: The thesaurus is not found at the provided path ({{- path}}).

synonyms.desc: This value is the name of the column of words to be searched in the file (contents and title).
synonyms.title: Synonym

term.desc: This value is the name of the tag column to be added.
term.title: Term

clean.desc: Automatically deletes existing tags if a term is excluded.
clean.title: Auto-clean

exclude.desc: Allow to exclude term using a property key.
exclude.title: Excluding terms

includedPaths.desc: Includes files from its paths when using the global command.
includedPaths.separate: Separate paths with coma, semicolon, spaces or newlines.
includedPaths.title: Included paths

removeAccents.desc: Ignores accents during recognition: helps identify
removeAccents.title: Remove accents

thesaurusPath.desc: Path to your CSV thesaurus (in your vault).
thesaurusPath.error: The provided file is not valide.
thesaurusPath.title: Thesaurus
